API_Description: Removes the specified toolbar button from the “Add-on” toolbar of Acrobat 9 or earlier. In Acrobat X, hides the specified button from the Plugin Addon Tools panel on the right side of the display area.

cName.description: The name of the toolbar button to remove.  Toolbar item names can be discovered with listToolbarButtons.

Examples:
A file named, `myConfig.js` , containing the following script is placed in one of the folder-level JavaScript folders.

```
app.hideToolbarButton("Hand");
```

When the viewer is started, the “Hand” icon does not appear.
